features: ✔️Some Things You Need to Know Before Purchasing: Our headset microphone is designed for voice amplifiers. Not for Smartphone/iPad. It also can plug in to a PC, just make sure your PC has the right jack.

✔️Great Value- Package includes 2 packs microphone., has wide compatibility. This headset microphone has 2 models, one is a 3-section interface, which is suitable for the independent interface of headphone microphone of digital equipment with 3.5mm music interface. The other is a 2-section interface, which is mainly used in various amplifiers. When purchasing, please confirm your equipment in advance. If you are not sure whether the microphone is suitable for your device, please contact us to confirm.

✔️COMFORTABLE AND DURABLE-This little microphone headset is made of high-quality ABS materials that are non-toxic and safe. The ergonomic/flexible design gives you freedom of movement for energetic performance for any occasion and the double ear frame fits comfortably for users wearing glasses, hats, headphone and provides loud, clear, high fidelity sound.

✔️FEATURE- Our microphone is Lightweight, adjustable, fashion and cool, with good workmanship, it does fit tightly and doesnot constantly fall off. The microphone arm can be bent to adjust the position and easy to display onto your head, adjustable to fit most size, Idea for family costume, nice gift to your family and friends.

✔️EASY TO CARRY- This hands free headset microphone designed for teachers, speechers, TV presenters, broadcasters, singers, lecturers, musicians and other situations requiring minimum microphone with hand-free operation. Small size, light weight, wear comfortable and easy to carry. (The head band can not remove from the wired mic, it is one piece.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I broke my originalHeadset I was worried a replacement might not be as good. Boy was I mistaken! I love the affordability and the wire is woven instead of plastic. So much nicer than my original!! And I have a spare!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with the Nintendo 64 VRU!
reviews.reviewText: I recently found a copy of Hey You Pikachu and its VRU unit at a used gaming store. It was my absolute favorite game in my teen years, so I immediately picked it up. The only problem is, the VRU was missing its microphone. The store owner told me that any mono microphone would work with the unit. I decided to try this mic out after considering my other options. To my surprise, it works fantastically with the VRU and I have been having a great time reliving my youth. As a bonus, since the mic fits over the head, it actually is a lot more convenient than its OEM counterpart!So for those out there who are looking for a replacement mic for the N64 VRU's for whatever reason, this is a great choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for PC use if you're willing to buy a few other things with it
reviews.reviewText: I bought this so I could use it with my PC while gaming. I can find good-sounding headphones easy, but finding some with a microphone attached is more difficult. Also more uncomfortable. This solves that. The band is lightweight, the microphone arm is VERY adjustable - it's one of those segmented metal tube deals that can bend and hold in nearly any shape - so I can place it where I want, and the sound quality is just dandy, at least according to the people I use to talk to it. A definite improvement in my normal setup.Now that said, this isn't perfect for PC use. There are a few limitations that mean you need to get some extra hardware to make it work for you. In particular: - The cable is very short, maybe 3-4 feet, so you'll probably need an extension cable unless you keep your head 3-4 feet away from your gaming rig. - The plug is mono, not stereo. Many modern gaming PCs (mine included) expect a stereo input and will wind up dumping all the audio to the left channel instead of both. Then as a bonus, a number of applications (like Discord) listen only to the RIGHT channel, so people won't just hear you out of one ear, they won't hear you at all. Maddening.Fortunately both of those problems can be fixed with a few low-cost purchases. One 3.5mm mono female to stereo male adapter, one 3.5mm mono extension cable and you're in business. With that in hand this becomes a perfect addition for any PC user who wants a decent microphone. I wholeheartedly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars 2 Different products. Pay attention you are not getting 2 identical head sets.
reviews.reviewText: These seem like a good enough quality product. Why on earth anyone would want 2 headsets with 2 different connector styles is beyond me. The point of buying two flimsy headsets, is they wear out! Users want to have a spare on hand. That is why they buy a set of 2. Change your marketing and sell 2 of the same device. Let your user choose Stereo (2 rings) or Mono (1 ring). Otherwise this is a reasonable product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars That makes it far less useful than it might have otherwise have been
reviews.reviewText: While this microphone might work with some systems without a pre-amp, it would not work with our PA amplifier ( PYLE PMSA20 50-Watt PA Mini Amplifier ) without one. That makes it far less useful than it might have otherwise have been. Still, once hooked up to the necessary pre-amp, the quality of the mic is excellent, and you can't beat the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The sound works well but within the first month of using BOTH the connection point became over sensitive and started to malfunction and get awful feedback when touched the wrong way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NO ISSUES WITH FEEDBACK!
reviews.reviewText: I've tried a couple of different microphones to use as a replacement to the original. This is the best of the bunch. Not only is it a fraction of the cost, but it is superior in quality. I have no problems with feedback or clicking due to weak wires. The wire on this microphone is fabric wrapped, and I feel that it will last longer than the others I've tried. Other microphones I've tried have lasted for 6 months to a year, which is decent for the prices I've paid. I'm guessing the Huacam mike may last even longer although it is WAY cheaper than the others. Since it's 2 mikes at about 1/3 the price of one of the other mikes I've purchased, I've decided to stock up and get two two-packs (four mikes) to have on hand. The Huacam mike seems surprisingly high quality. So pleased with purchase.Here's a link to the voice amp I use with this mike (which I'm VERY pleased with btw): VoiceBooster Voice Amplifier & Mp3 Player 16watts Black MR2200 (Aker) by TK Products,Portable, for Teachers, Coaches, Tour Guides, Presentations, Costumes, Etc. The only advantage the other mikes have over the Huacam is that they are lower profile and lightweight. These are the other more expensive, low-profile (yet all have issues with feedback and clicking). Pyle-Pro PMEM1 Headworn Omni-Directional Microphone (3.5mm / 1/4'') VoiceBooster Low Profile Light-Weight Single Ear-Hook Omnidirectional Microphone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Decent mic, have to position right at mouth - but Sponge cover sheds and will mess you up.
reviews.reviewText: You know the old complaint about Chinese products and how they sometimes smell like burnt rubber tires? Well this is that, and its right by your nose and it most likely sheds, as every time I've worn this it has made me wheeze and cough like crazy. Solution is simple, just remove the sponge cover, buuut, some residue will remain inside and will irritate you again (like it did me). Additional solution (that I've yet to try) is blow a can of Compressed Air into it to clear that junk out.Otherwise, Cheap mic does its job, albeit on the very quiet side, you'll need to boost mic gain in windows and position it right on your lips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got these for using on Teams calls, the microphone in my laptop is quite sensitive and would trigger while I took notes so I wanted an easier option. The head or neck band itself is comfortable and the mic is easy to adjust into various positions without being intrusive.Sound quality is great, had zero issues.Two items came in this pack, which was brilliant as the other can be paired up with a small amplifier we have at home to use during other activities we do with the kids. Good price for a really versatile bit of kit. I do recommend them.

reviews.reviewTitle: あっという間に断線。汗などの水分に弱いようです。
reviews.reviewText: どこが悪いのかは不明。使用しているうちにザザッとノイズが入って音が聞こえなくなりました。耳からコードをシャツの中を這わせてベルトに取り付けたハンディホンに繋いで使用。体が汗ばんできたころにノイズが入ってお終いです。3時間ほどの出来事でした。無理な引っ張りや圧縮等してないので汗によるショートなのでしょうか？時間がたつと復活するのかも知れませんが評価の使用もありません。

Tenía un altavoz con micro, del que se me estropeó el micro. Lo comprobé, probando que un micro de otro compañero funcionaba bien. He pedido estos y van de lujo. Además, por el precio que tienen estoy super satisfecho de la compra.
The mic exceeded my expectations! Good build quality and above average microphone sound quality as expected.
